entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
